Title: Prizzi's Honor
Cast: Jack Nicholson, Kathleen Turner, Robert Loggia, John Randolph, William Hickey, Lee Richardson, Michael Lombard, Anjelica Huston, George Santopietro, Lawrence Tierney, CCH Pounder, Ann Selepegno, Vic Polizos, Dick O'Neill, Sully Boyar
Plot: A professional hit man and hit woman fall in love. Charley Partanna is a hit-man who works for the Prizzis, one of the richest crime syndicate families in the country. Unbeknownst to Charley,the Prizzis just hired Irene Walker, a free-lance killer, to eliminate someone who double-crossed them. When Irene and Charley fall in love their jobs become complicated. Their jobs become impossible when each is given a contract that neither can go through with. Written by Tiff Banks
Keywords: love, wedding, assassin, lingerie slip, three brothers
Location: 3 Pierrepont Place, Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Kathleen Turner, Robert Loggia
Writer: Richard Condon (novel), Richard Condon (screenplay) | 1 more credit »
Description: Directed by John Huston.  With Jack Nicholson, Kathleen Turner, Robert Loggia, John Randolph. A professional hit man and hit woman fall in love.
